channel.title: til on A blog by st3v3nhunt
channel.description: Recent content in til on A blog by st3v3nhunt

item.title: 🪅 Build, create and start named services from Docker Compose
item.description: It is possible to build, create, start and up a specific service or services from Docker Compose.

item.title: 📓 Docker Compose version key is not required after 3.7
item.description: From version 3.8 of the compose file specification the version key is no longer required.

item.title: ↕️ Ordering content
item.description: It is straight forward to order content in Hugo by leveraging front matter variables.

item.title: 📓 Interacting with vim's dictionary
item.description: Add a misspelt word to Vim’s dictionary with zg. See the list of suggestions for a misspelt word with z=.

item.title: 📓 Get last Git commit message
item.description: In a Git repo run git log -1 to get details of the last commit.

item.title: 🐚 Useful bash builtins
item.description: A subset of Bash builtins I occasionally forget about and want a quick reference to.

item.title: 🔍 Search hidden files with ripgrep
item.description: ripgrep is an excellent alternative to grep. One of its benefits is how it filters the files it searches.

item.title: 🐚 Source and export all vars from a file
item.description: If you ever need to load a bunch of env vars into an environment it is easily accomplished by having them listed in a .
